content:
Hi, I'm looking for some people that would take the code from here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82191 and measure the impact of it in different situations.
I have measured around 10% better performance if T is small (fits in cpu register), otherwise perf is the same
Also changing ptr::copy in line 1598 to conditional copy_nonoverlapping seems to be faster on my intel laptop and much slower on amd one
I'm curious if someone can reproduce this
